item.title: Graffiti, 27th December
item.description:
Why is the graffiti all along Woolwich rd not being removed it's becoming an eyesaw and because it isn't being removed, more and more is appearing . 1st on the side of Popeye's restaurant. 2nd on the front of anytime fitness 3rd. Seat beside Costa 4th on the side of Costa 5th on the wall of makro on Woolwich rd behind the bus stop Not good for a distance of a few hundred yards . Thank you .
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass on the floor, 27th December
item.description:
The area of the park located near the arena, where skateboards and roller skates are used, is currently covered with broken glass. This situation poses a safety risk and could cause accidents, especially for children who practice this sport. We kindly request that this area be cleaned as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marina Close, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: State of the street concrete, 27th December
item.description:
The Road is in terrible state. The holes are getting so big that I need to actively avoid them to not get the car damaged. I am genuinely worried of getting into one with the bike, potentially with my kids on it, and get seriously injured.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitepost Lane, Ladywell, Greater London

item.title: Loose man hole cover making a lot of noise outside Serica Court Care home, 27th December
item.description:
This section of Greenwich High Road was recently resurfaced but the man hole cover next to the crossing between Serica Court and the shopping area opposite was not replaced correctly. Every time a vehicle drives over it the cover makes a very load noise and it clearly needs to be refitted properly. It is disturbing residents at Serica Care Home.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
